item.description:
Hi, Everybody:

Different than our larger Sunday hikes, this one is designed to be smaller, leisurely, and leave some options for perhaps trying some of the outer trails in this great location (it really is a great spot for hiking!) so keep your eyes on the calendar as we head through the summer! I'm also planning some smaller Saturday hikes such as this one, meeting for a great breakfast at this very popular restaurant:

http://villagepancake...

The first one of these is for today at 9:30. Following that, we will head over to Ipswich for a super hike and bird watch:

http://www.massaudubo...

Allow an hour or so for breakfast - then we'll head up to Ipswich - and then estimate at least three hours for the hike which will be very leisurely and total around 5 miles. If we wish to try some of the outer trails, add another hour or so and a couple of extra miles.

This hike and social is designed for those who enjoy smaller groups and who have a lot of leisurely time to spend outside, without a day end deadline in case we get lost (only kidding)! I will look forward to seeing you then! Bird watchers: this is your day:)

Randy
RandyS@maine.rr.com
PS - If you sign up for this one, please be sure and change your RSVP on the waiting list for the earlier hikes, in order to give other members a chance to move up in the queue:)

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Breakfast in Rowley and Hike in Ipswich!
